Another great pick could be "Stoker" (2013), a psychological thriller featuring Mia Wasikowska and Jacki Weaver. This film tells the story of India, whose father dies mysteriously, leading to the arrival of her enigmatic Uncle Charlie, played by Matthias Schoenaerts. The suspenseful plot unfolds as India becomes increasingly entangled with her uncle's charismatic allure. Enjoy the movies!

This epic film is based on the popular video game series and follows a group of human heroes as they battle against an invading Orc horde. Ruth Negga and Dominic Cooper deliver captivating performances in this visually stunning production. Enjoy your movie-watching!

I'd highly recommend watching "The Godfather Part II". This epic crime drama masterpiece tells a compelling story of the early life of Vito Corleone and his son, Michael, as they navigate their way through the Italian-American Mafia. It stars an impressive cast including Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, and Diane Keaton. Enjoy the journey into the heart of the Corleone family!

If you're interested in a more recent supernatural thriller, "The Rite" is another intriguing choice. This film follows an American seminary student as he embarks on an exorcism course in Italy, featuring a captivating performance by Anthony Hopkins.
